game.name: Intelligence: Underwater Kingdom
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with the animals of the underwater Kingdom) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with the animals of the underwater Kingdom) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.
